titlestmt.titleproper: American Society of International Law records
A Guide to the American Society of International Law records FA1873

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:59:13 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: American Society of International Law records

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: American Society of International Law has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them. Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Institutional records, historical archives, and the Howard M. Holtzmann papers.
